button.label: Set Up Workbook
button.supertip: Create all necessary sheets for the add-in.

button.label: General Purpose
button.supertip: Contains all tags used in the system

button.label: For Steel Member Design
button.supertip: Contains tags commonly used in steel member design

button.label: For Steel Connection Design
button.supertip: Contains tags commonly used in steel connection design

button.label: For RC Design
button.supertip: Contains tags commonly used in RC design

button.label: Import SAP Output .xlsx (Existing Data will be DELETED)
button.supertip: Please import the SAP Output file (.xlsx), which includes the following tables: 1. Frame Section Assisgnment 2. Frame Connectivity 3. Frame Force and Moment 4. Joints Coordinate 5. Joint Restraints Assignment 6. Frame Local Axes Assignment Existing data in the workbook will be deleted.

button.label: Import SAP Output .xlsx
button.supertip: Please import the SAP Output file (.xlsx), which includes the following tables: 1. Frame Section Assisgnment 2. Frame Connectivity 3. Frame Force and Moment 4. Joints Coordinate 5. Joint Restraints Assignment 6. Frame Local Axes Assignment

button.label: Import GSA Output .csv (Existing Data will be DELETED)
button.supertip: Please import the GSA output file (.csv), which includes the following tables: 1. 'Element' 2. 'Beam and Spring Forces and Moments' 3. 'Joints Coordinate' Existing data in the workbook will be deleted.

button.label: Import GSA Output .csv
button.supertip: Please import the GSA output file (.csv), which includes the following tables: 1. 'Element' 2. 'Beam and Spring Forces and Moments' 3. 'Joints Coordinate'

button.label: Process Model Data
button.supertip: Process Data, including creating members and identifying possible connection/restraint in model.

button.label: Get Identified Connection Data
button.supertip: The Identified Connection Data will be output to a new sheet

button.label: Map Connection Types
button.supertip: Map Connection Data according to User Setting

menu.label: Extract Frame Force To Summary Table
Extract Connection Force To Summary Table

button.label: Extract Forces at Connections (Correspondence Cases)
button.supertip: Frame Forces (Correspondece cases) at the selected Connection Types will be extracted.

button.label: Extract All Forces at Connections
button.supertip: All Frame Forces at the selected Connection Types will be extracted. Ordered by Connection Types->Node->Load Comb->Max/Min Permutation->Frame

button.label: Put Data To Design Worksheets
button.supertip: The data in the Summary Sheet will be transferred to/ returned from specified Design Worksheet according to the tag setting

button.label: Clear All Data
button.supertip: All imported data will be deleted.
